alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 01 at 2:12AM MST until March 01 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arizona and southeast and southern California. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ to 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central La Paz; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma
